728610f-a.title: Richmond: Bloomingdale Road - Clay Pit Road
728610f-a.text:
(1)
Bloomingdale Road, west side, between Clay PitAand Sharrotts
Road, showing (right) the Rossville African Methodist Episcopal
Church and a house adjoining to the south which bears No. 570.
September 23, 1927.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
The same, another view.
September 23, 1927.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
728610f-a.folder: Bloomingdale Road & Clay Pit Road, Staten Island, NY
